plot: Since his directorial debut 10 years ago, Simon, a forty something filmmaker, nowadays spends more time shooting the breeze than shooting films. Following a silly bet he makes with an actor...
title: Au cas où je n'aurais pas la palme d'or
plot_es: Since his directorial debut 10 years ago, Simon, a forty something filmmaker, nowadays spends more time shooting the breeze than shooting films. Following a silly bet he makes with an actor...
original_name: Au cas où je n'aurais pas la palme d'or
